name: Bunny's Pizza Tycoon
description:
Bunny's Pizza Tycoon is a casual horror point and click game where you play a restaurant owner by day and an employee by night. Setup the store for your customers and try to earn money every day. Then as the employee survive the night. Some of the features of the game are listed below:

- Customize your restaurant during the day and buy items such as tables, pans, playable arcades and
more!

- Buy and play arcades with retro tokens! You can even earn credits playing them!

- Buy themes and boosts in the main menu with credits!

- Use night tokens to skip nights or buy upgrades during the nights!

- Earn medals that are difficult to get! There are 7 medals!

Game was made using piskel for the art, FL Studio and Musecore for the music
and sound effects, and unity for the game engine.
